channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AK
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AK

item.title: Report X-2023101131
item.description:
Report X-2023101131

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-07T18:15:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-10
  • City: ANC
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: ALASKA AIRLINES, INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Boxes were on pallet being run through XRay Machine. I took a closer look at one box via the smaller xray machine to confirm aerosol cans were inside.

item.title: Report X-2023100718
item.description:
Report X-2023100718

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-07T18:15:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-04
  • City: ANC
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: ALASKA AIRLINES, INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: X RAYED SHIPMENT AND SAW AN OUTLINE THAT LOOKED LIKE AEROSOLS. PERFORMED A PHYSICAL SEARCH AND CONFIRMED THAT THE SHIPMENT DID CONTAIN ONE PACKET OF AEROSOLS (WHIPPED CREAM).

item.title: Report X-2023100015
item.description:
Report X-2023100015

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-09T18:13:50+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-28
  • City: ANCHORAGE
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On Sept 28th, during the morning sort a plastic jerrican was found that had developed a leak after it was dropped due to a poorly build pallet. The jerrican contained UN1824, Sodium hydroxide solution, 8, II. The package was placed into a salvage drum and is being held pending disposition.

item.title: Report X-2023090838
item.description:
Report X-2023090838

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-09T18:13:50+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-05
  • City: FAI
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: ALASKA AIRLINES, INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: X-2023090838-Had put totes through x-ray and then had to physical search because of the items that showed in the x-ray phase and we needed to verify what was in the totes. Opened up the totes to find multiple items that were not declared. X-2023090839-Multiple items were found while screening totes. Attached pictures of items. One of the totes had fluid in the bottom and on items that we do not know what type of fluid it is. there is a compressor of some type that we do not know if it is hazardous or not MEK 1 gallon Arposolve- Isopropanol 1 gallon X-2023090840-Multiple items were found while screening totes. Attached pictures of items. One of the totes had fluid in the bottom and on items that we do not know what type of fluid it is. there is a compressor of some type that we do not know if it is hazardous or not MEK 1 gallon Arposolve- Isopropanol 1 gallon

item.title: Report X-2023090486
item.description:
Report X-2023090486

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-08T18:14:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-12
  • City: FAIRBANKS
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: RESPONDED TO A PACKAGE SOAKED IN FUEL WITH A STRONG FUEL ODOR. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED AN AIRCRAFT FUEL CONTROL UNIT LEAKING FUEL. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER BOX. OUTER BOX HAS FRAGILE, THIS SIDE UP, AND HANDLE WITH CARE STICKERS APPLIED. THIS PACKAGE WAS SHIPPED FROM MIAMI FLORIDA USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER FV6926, TATONDUK OUTFITTERS LIMITED, 5525 AIRPORT INDUSTRIAL RD., FAIRBANKS AK 99709.

  • Description: While screening shipment through xray, found item that looked like DG. Opened shipment and located 1 aerosol can. Removed item from shipment, 1 pc at 0.4 lbs. Rest of shipment is okay to ship.

item.title: Report X-2023100360
item.description:
Report X-2023100360

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-07T18:15:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-09-05
  • City: ANC
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: ALASKA AIRLINES, INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: When unloading the inbound igloo the shipment was noticeably not packaged well, and a note was on a tote that said "Ammo and Shooting" so the tote was opened to reveal ammo in ammo boxes and a couple of loose shotgun shells.
